articles.description: Patricia and Leslie McWaters spent 47 years together, raising their children, then grandchildren and then great-grandchildren. And last week, the Michigan couple died together of Covid-19, within the same minute.

articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sephora is opening up mini shops inside Kohl's stores - CNN
articles.description: Sephora is set to open mini shops inside Kohl's stores, with the first 200 locations debuting in fall of 2021. It's part of an effort to reach more customers outside the mall.

articles.author: Associated, Natalie Rahhal Us
articles.title: CDC advisors vote health workers, nursing homes, get covid vaccines first - Daily Mail
articles.description: Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices member Dr Beth Bell said the group is 'acting none too soon' to decide who gets vaccinated first. It will vote tonight on who to recommend for priority.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tennessee mother charged after toddler burned to death by bath water - WKRN News 2
articles.description: A 27-year-old Union City woman has been arrested weeks after investigators say her 14-month-old son died from severe burns caused by scalding hot bath water.
